participant_1.background:
I'm a healthy weight for my height and build.
I'm happy with my life and my health.
i hate skiing.
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.
my favorite food is cheeseburgers.

participant_2.background:
I am slightly overweight because I spend too much time watching television and not enough time exercising.
My most valuable possession is my Tigers baseball jersey.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I listen to music that helps me calm down and release my stress.
I take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable.

content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1. What is your name?
Hello, nice to meet you. My name is participant_2.
It is nice to meet you too! So, what are you interested in?
I like to watch tv, play video games, and listen to music.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to watch tv too. What kind of tv shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch comedies and dramas. I also like to watch sports.
I like comedies too! I also like to watch documentaries. What is your favorite tv show?
My favorite tv show is The Office. I also like to watch Game of Thrones and The Walking Dead.
I love The Office! I have seen it all the way through at least three times.
Me too! I love The Office. It is so funny.
So, what do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I teach elementary school.
That must be fun! I have always wanted to be a teacher.
It is fun! I love working with kids.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to go to the gym and play video games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my family and friends too. I also like to go to the gym and play video games.
It is nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
It is nice to meet you too!
